original_title: Star Wars: Droids - The Battle Against Sise Fromm
overview: Combination of episodes 1 to 4 of the animated series Droid Adventures.  After being dumped in the Ingo Desert by their master, C-3PO and R2-D2 accidentally run into several new masters and collide with gangsters, criminals, pirates, Boba Fett, IG-88, the Galactic Empire and other threats , finding themselves in various difficult situations.
title: Star Wars: Droids - The Battle Against Sise Fromm
